entry.title: about me
entry.summary:
Fragment

When you watch the scenery from the bridge,
The sightseer watches you from the balcony.
The bright moon adorns your window,
While you adorn another’s dream.

--------------------追寻快乐和智慧的生活！--------------------
entry.content:
